entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is described as a fourteen-year-old boy who has found solace in his girlfriend at Hogwarts. He is mentioned to be suffering from personal loss and emotional blows.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is described as a plain but ambitious girl who has a taste for famous wizards. She is said to have been invited by Viktor Krum to visit him in Bulgaria over the summer holidays.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is described as a Bulgarian Seeker and hero of the last World Quidditch Cup. He is said to be openly smitten with Hermione Granger and has invited her to visit him in Bulgaria.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is described as a pretty girl who says that Hermione Granger is really ugly.

relationships.description: Harry Potter and Hermione Granger are described as a couple, with Harry finding solace in her at Hogwarts.
Viktor Krum is said to be openly smitten with Hermione Granger and has invited her to visit him in Bulgaria.
Pansy Parkinson says that Hermione Granger is really ugly, indicating a negative opinion of her.
